NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 PHLOX: Friends! One of tentacled organisms has become beached on the shore of Statue Island following its visit to the surface! I am unable to help it without being electrified.. I request urgent assistance in aiding it before it perishes! 2 1 DAZ: I compliment your eyes, Phlox! Give me a moment: I shall voyage there using a voyager stone, and use my voyager to safely guide it back into the waves! 3 2 PHLOX: Daz, that was incredible! Your vessel of alloy was not phased in the slightest by the organism's terrific bioelectricity! 4 2 PHLOX: Are there any limits at all to what the voyager is impervious to? 5 4 DAZ: The voyager does dissolve in large bodies of water or when impacted badly.. But otherwise, it is able to weather almost any hazard it is exposed to! I have faith it will soon allow us to work remotely, from the safety of our homes. 6 5 PHLOX: I should have known this project was a long scheme to convince Cassava to move back to the Hanging City with you! BJelly R2 1,3 BJelly R3 2 Workshop Locked EX1 5
